solution_line_template: Remi drinks the same amount of water every day for a week except for when he spills some of it. His water bottle holds {bottle_capacity} ounces which he drinks {refills_per_day} times a day, {bottle_capacity} x {refills_per_day} = <<{daily_intake_no_spill}={daily_intake_no_spill}>>{daily_intake_no_spill} ounces a typical day.

Over {num_days_in_week} days, without spilling anything, Remi drinks {daily_intake_no_spill} ounces x {num_days_in_week} days = <<{daily_intake_no_spill}*{num_days_in_week}={total_intake_no_spill}>>{total_intake_no_spill} ounces.
Except Remi spills {spill_2} + {spill_1} ounces of water during the week = <<{spill_2}+{spill_1}={total_spilled_water}>>{total_spilled_water} ounces of water Remi spills.

Total, Remi drinks {total_intake_no_spill} ounces - {total_spilled_water} ounces of spilled water = <<{total_intake_no_spill}-{total_spilled_water}={actual_intake}>>{actual_intake} ounces Remi drank during the week.
